Text:

Cheers.

@Trizomu: Het is maar net welke kwaliteit en vrijheid je wil,  700 of 800 mb is dan kleiner, maar ook vaak minder van kwaliteit! Geef mij maar gewoon de grote files, ben ik zekerder van een kwaliteit, kan ik alles zelf handmatig instellen (ipv ingebrande subs...)  en ik kan ze gelijk als dvd wegbranden als dat nodig is!

Hey kellebel010! thanks so much for the movie. I was wondering if you could upload it with the menu and all the extra stuff?? 
If you can, that would be great.
Thanx so much!!

DAKERS69:  You can easily burn the contents of the Video TS file folder if you use a burning program such as Nero express.  The files, as presented here, are exactly as they would be on the original DVD, so all you need to do is burn them to a DVD and you're good to go.  Take a look at a regular DVD's structure, and you'll see what I'm talking about.  I hope this helps you.  
I've been looking for this one for DAYS!  :)  

Thanks to the 2LionsTeam for their INCREDIBLE uploads!!  :)
